A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like:
One Star for some good special effects.
- acting was bad (seems like acting only supports "funny dialogues" and action scenes)
- story doesn't compete with the "old" Star Wars Saga (EP I - VI) and is build around action scenes
- awful "funny" dialogues\, mostly done to initiate action scenes and even more funny jabbering
- could be a movie made by The Asylum if there would be more boobs\, altough there was too much of action scenes\, funny scenes and jabbering.
- if one associates Star Wars with Jedi myths\, Sith lore or the Cantina Band: this movie destroys every former belief
